name: Space Runner (micaluzbenitez)
description:
Space Runner  Endless game

Welcome to Space Runner! In this game you will
be an astronaut who will have to dodge obstacles,
dodging or destroying them!

You will also have pickups whit different scores,
the more you collect, the more points you will
get!

Explore Mercury, Earth and Mars,
You only have one life, GOOD LUCK!
